1.0.name: wordpress/mntextselector
1.0.description: mnTextSelector lets you quickly create custom functions to run when a user selects specific text on your site. Say you want to give the user an option to view the definition of a word they highlight, you just create a function or a link to view the definition and apply it to this jQuery plugin. When your user selects a word or a string of text, the options you provide will appear.
